item.title: Counseling and Prevention Resources
item.description: Counseling and Prevention Resources Here is a list of global helplines, because sometimes outside support is needed to help you make positive changes. United States & Canada Crisis Text Line https://www.crisistextline.org/ Text HOME to 741741 (USA & Canada) Kids Help Phone (Canada) https://kidshelpphone.ca/ Text CONNECT to 686868 (Canada) Call 1 800 668 6868 (Canada) National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (USA) http://www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org 1 800 273 TALK (8255) 1 800 SUICIDE (784 2433)
